0.text: Bug 24877  Cannot get file extension from swt FileDialog.

1.text: There's no way to get the file extension that the user selected from the  FileDialog.

2.text: It makes this dialog almost unusable since we can't determine the  correct file extension to append to the file name.

3.text: We need an api for the file  dialog to return the "Save as type" field that the user selected in the  FileDialog.

4.text: Athough we are using this dialog in our own product, this problem can be  illustrated when you export to a jar file.

5.text: Select *.zip in the "Save as type"  and enter a file name (eg.

7.text: The export wizard should use the  file "test.zip" when this happens.

8.text: STEPS: 1) Select a java file 2) Select File->Export... 3) Select JAR file and press Next 4) Press Browse... to select a Save As file dialog 5) Enter test for the file name 6) Select *.zip for the "Save as type" field 7) Press Save  Result: The JAR export wizard uses "test" for the JAR file field.

9.text: Expected result: The JAR export wizard should use the "test.zip" for the JAR file field.
